text:
I have a complicated function that at some point uses 100 times this one that I defined previously:
```@inline nth_neighbor(i,n,N) = mod1(i + n,N) ```
Other things also happen 100 times but this takes most of the time according to the profiler. Is mod1 expected to be slow? If it is something not known I can try and do a MWE to post a better question.

text: How slow is slow? Integer division is much, much slower than other integer operations, but it's still just maybe 10 nanoseconds
